The dress is comfortable, not itchy, and customers consider it a good value for money. While some it runs true to size, others mention it runs a little big. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous Dress! Fabulous Fit! Beautiful!
items.body: THIS is THE dress! It’s just beautiful!!! Great quality and it’s also very soft and comfortable! The zipper is very nicely stitched into the dress so it’s invisible and the seams lay flat. I have bought several dresses over the past few month for my upcoming honeymoon- and this dress is better than some of the $400 dresses I’ve tried! It is rare when you find something at a reasonable price that fits well and is also nice quality. I am between a size 6 and 8 and the medium fits very well. I could maybe also fit into a small but I like that the dress glides over my figure instead of clinging to it. I have a 28 inch waist, but I wear a 36D bra, so I usually need to buy dresses a bit bigger to accommodate my chest. This dress fits very well around my large bust, which is really rare for something that fits close to the body! I can’t say enough about this dress! I also appreciate its modest, but is still very sexy. A lot of modest dresses can look a bit matronly on my middle aged body- but this one certainly doesn’t! I also love that this dress is ready for date night, a wedding, graduation or just about ANY occasion you’d need to wear a dress! Love, love, love this dress and I’m delighted to have found it! Read more
items.author: kwi

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprisingly good quality for the price
items.body: Surprisingly good quality and fit for an Amazon dress and the price. I ordered black for an evening cocktail event. I bought size Large - I’m 5’5”, size 36D and 168 pounds. It fit like a glove and was surprisingly forgiving. I haven’t had to dress up in years and this made me feel comfortable and stylish. I wore spanx under but didn’t really need to. I got away with a black bra under that blended into the lace I will likely get another color for day events. Read more
items.author: Muttnut

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect wedding guest dress
items.body: This dress was just what I was looking for a recent wedding. The color was brighter than I expected but beautiful. The fit was perfect. Felt great to dance in all night. Read more
items.author: E. Williams

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars A great little black dress!
items.body: Classy, black dress. I am 5’2, 145lbs & big chested (38C). I tried a Large & it fits like a glove. The medium was too tight in the chest. Very comfortable. The fabric is medium weight, breathable and the inner liner has a little stretch. Read more
items.author: Jacquelyn G

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Did not wrinkle while wearing!
items.body: I loved this dress for a wedding I went to! Comfortable!! The very top and the back of the dress are not fully lined like the rest of the dress so a strapless bra is needed unless you can find a color bra that matches. Material is nice, the lace did not pull anywhere and it is lined well. I am 5’8”, a 34DDD and hips are 38 inches. The size medium was a perfect fit. I sometimes have trouble finding dressing that fit because of my breast size. The zipper on the back goes down pretty far making the dress easier to get into. I was comfortable in the dress all evening long and it did not wrinkle from the seatbelt on the way there nor from sitting at the wedding. I did have to iron it when I got it to get the fold wrinkles out. I have yet to wash it because of the rayon, but the color was the same as pictured. I got the purple. Read more
items.author: tom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Prefect!
items.body: This dress is so pretty and fits perfect. Rund Slightly big so if you're in between sizes, size down. I'm 170lbs and 5'10 and it falls at the knees. Perfect and a great price! Read more
items.author: Blaze

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Runs small
items.body: Such a pretty dress but definitely runs small. All of the product reviews said the fit was just right and amazon suggested size Large and usually they are correct but not this time. Tight in waist and hips. I would exchange for an XL but I don’t think it would be much different and it would probably be too long. If you are a curvy girl size up. Read more
items.author: carebear85

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect black dress
items.body: Love this dress. Better than I expected. Fits perfectly. The zipper is a little janky, so I leave it unzipped on the hanger. Otherwise, this dress is perfect. Read more
items.author: antoinette s.

short_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Dress Cocktail Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Magenta, Black, Sage, Velvet Wine, Coffee, Gray Blue, Blush Bean, Dark Green, Light Olive, Royal, Navy, Plum, Pink, White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
